data.title: Off campus Apartments for Rent
data.text:
1

AdressFurnitureRent cost in NISMunicipality, gas and building maintenance feesSize (sqm)Available from (ENTER A DATE)No of BedroomsLandlord nameMobileEmailNotes@dropdown@

2

These landlords all have several apartments and have a lot of experience in renting to Weizmann Postdocs and students - you should check with them for availability

Golan 058-444-6662

3

David Azizi050-688-0003

4

Ram Levy050-622-1455

5

6

Eizenberg 31, RehovotFully furnished including appliances5400~550 municipality, 150 maintenance. per month10025/6/20243Ben0546560737benefron@gmail.comSutible for a family. 10 minutes walk from the Weizmann. Very quite and bright. Big kitchen and living area. Accelsible shelter in the building

7

Rupin 28, Rehovot3 rooms apartment, Fully furnished, spacious kitchen with full equipm+ents, Double bed room , two bathrooms1500300-400 a monthMay 1st305244232811 min walk to Weizmann

8

HaRav Herzog 33, Rehovotfully furnished: 2 double beds, fully furnished living room/kitchen, and bathroom (with solar/electric water heater). Big balcony with laundary machine.4000city tax, maintence and water included in rent. Electricity and internet separately.~60June 10th2 (one without door used as storage room currently)Boaz050-7502030Buzifriedman@gmail.comApartment on 5 th floor, elevator to 4th floor. Suitable for single or couple, 5 min walk from the Weizmann institute. Quiet and well-lit. Big balcony to make a small garden on rooftop. Nice and helpful landlord.

9

Hanassi harishon street 21Partially furnished including bed, sofa, cup board, bed mattresses, WiFi, cable for tv, one table , one electric stove, 3300~50-100 shekel for electricity per month30May 9th1 bedroom and 1 living roomOfir052-500-2003gmohapatra2009@gmail.comSuitable for single or couples. Bright apartment. Only 200 m away from Weizmann and 5 min away from faculty of agriculture

10

Baruch Spinoza 21, RehovotStudio room with bathroom and kitchenette. Bed, Microwave, Oven, Fridge, Washing machine.2200Electricity extra 50-150~18June 11 Studio roomUri Bareket0506717177ubareket@gmail.comSuitable for 1 person. 15 min walk to Weizmann gate.

11

Tova ve-Tuvya Miler St 19 A, Rehovot4 bedroom flat (individual lease), master bedroom with private bathroom. Fully furnished including tables, big closet, washing machine/dryer, oven, dishwasher.2650~350/month for arnona, water, electricity and Wi-Fi2016/05/20241 bedroom + private bathroom, living room, fully furnished kitchenIsrael Yankelovich054-880-2025Very beautiful, newly built apartment; suitable for 1 person. 12 minute walk to Pinsker gate, and 10 min walk to Shufersal on Herzl.

12

Yehuda Gur and Hanasi Harishon2 rooms are currently available.

Apartment has three 1.5 room units (or size equivalent) of total 16sm. Shared bathroom and WC (separate) and beautiful lןving room and kitchen space

It is conveniently located on the corner of Yehuda Gur and Hanasi Harishon in a quiet but central location a few minutes walk from the institute, Herzl st. and the train station.

Each room is separately air conditioned. It’s on the top 4th floor (no elevator) so it is very quiet. It is equipped with a fridge, a stove and a laundry machine. Bedrooms are unfurnished (we can provide basic furnishing of bed, closet, desk for extra 100NIS a month).1700 per room350 for whole apartmentshared apartmentOne room available in July, the other in August3Haim Beidenkopf

Haim - 050-3036388

Tenant (Ronny 052-734-7402)

landlord is a WIS scientist

13

3 Haavoda St RehovotWardrobe, bed, couch, sofa, coffee table, dining table+chairs, oven, stove, refrigerator, washing machine1610 Nis160-190Nis96August 1st 20243Alon Wald(50) 685-5994alon@g-h.org.ilA 3 partners (tenants) apartment. The price indicated is for 1 tenant. Same goes with the added fees estimation

14

Beit Apoalim 6 Rehovotsofa and cabinet possible4900 nisMunicipality 890 for 2 months, Bulding maintenance 250 per month80August 1st 20242Dalia Gilboa546704979daliagilboa23@gmail.comThe apatrment is very central and yet quiet , with big rooms, air condition, dishwasher and stove. 2 bathrooms, 6th floor out of 8th, two elevators.

15

35 Wiezmann Street, RehovotFurnished in full3350 NISincluded but no electricity351.Aug 241Etty Horowitz0523394992ettyhorowitz@gmail.com

16

Amos Danielli 39fully equipped, incl. washing machine.3000including municipal taxes and water, not including electricity3015 August 24studioYuval: speaks English

Orna: speaks, English, German, Switzerland054-2280712

054-4973284In the heart of the city, in a quiet location, for rent, a beautiful single room unit with a courtyard with a pastoral seating area - Separate entrance - cable TV and Wifi 2 minutes walk to Rehovot Mall. 10 minutes walk to the Weizmann Institute and the Faculty of Agriculture. Also possible for short periods

17

Be'eri 11/4 RehovotFully furnished 5 room apartment. One room available, Dishwasher, washing machine, office, living room, kitched appliances, everything you need. 200 inch screen to watch your favorite shows and movies. Second floor. All bills included: internet, water, gas, electricity, arnona, va'ad habait. Only 3 flatmates, 3 bedrooms, office, kitchen, living room, and two full bathrooms2500Included16001 August5Isaac0508503111issac.ponce@weizmann.ac.il
